Character

Class WallFollowingEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Element
      • Character.Enemy
        • Character.WallFollowingEnemy

  • public class WallFollowingEnemy
extends Enemy
    Class for the wall following enemy. A enemy that at all times must be next to a wall tile.
    Author:
    Miles Singleton, Andy Kuo

    • Constructor Detail

      • WallFollowingEnemy

        public WallFollowingEnemy(int newX,
                          int newY,
                          java.lang.String movDirection,
                          java.lang.String hand)
                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a new instance of a Wall following enemy.
        Parameters:
        newX - Enemy X position.
        newY - Enemy Y position.
        movDirection - The direction that this enemy is moving
        hand - The hand that's touching the wall for direction determining.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Tells the system that this method could cause an error of this type.

      • checkHandWall

        public boolean checkHandWall(GameBoard gb,
                             int x,
                             int y)
        Checks whether the enemy's hand touching the wall.
        Parameters:
        gb - The current gameboard in play.
        x - Current X position of the enemy.
        y - Current Y position of the enemy.
        Returns:
        True if next move will be next to a wall.
